description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPPOOL Webinar and Video Conference with Jitsi Meet allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Webinar and Video Conference with Jitsi Meet: from n/a through 2.6.3.

product.name: Webinar and Video Conference with Jitsi Meet
Webinar and Video Conference with Jitsi Meet
